name: CustomMaterial.AmbientOcclusion
desc: An object that defines an entity’s exposure to ambient light.

items.name: init(texture: CustomMaterial.Texture?)
items.desc: Creates an object from an image texture.

items.name: init(PhysicallyBasedMaterial.AmbientOcclusion)
items.desc: Creates an object from a physically based material’s ambient occlusion property.

items.name: var texture: CustomMaterial.Texture?
items.desc: The entity’s exposure to ambient light specified using a UV-mapped image.
